question.title: Arithmetic Operators
question.content:
You are given two integer variables x and y. You need to perform the following operations:

  • p = x + y : Addition
  • q = x - y : Subtraction
  • r = x * y :Multiplication
  • s = x / y : Division
  • t = x % y : Modulo

Examples:

Input: x = 1, y = 2
Output: 3 -1 2 0 1 
Explanation: The given operations are performed.
Input: x = 3, y = 4 
Output: 7 -1 12 0 3 
Explanation: The given operations are performed

hints:
• p = x+y : Addition
  • q = x-y : Subtraction
  • r = x*y :Multiplication
  • s = x/y : Division
  • t = x%y : Modulo
